entry.title: The Center Variety of Polynomial Differential Systems
entry.summary: We investigate the symmetry component of the center variety of polynomial differential systems, corresponding to systems with an axis of symmetry in the real plane. We give a general algorithm to find this irreducible subvariety and compute its dimension. We show that our methods provide a simple way to compute the radical of the ideal generated by the focus quantities and, therefore, to estimate the cyclicity of a center in the case when the ideal is radical. In particular, we use our methods to get a simple proof of the famous Bautin theorem on the cyclicity of the quadratic system.
